name: VANILLA SIN Hair and Fragrance Body Mist
categories: Fragrance, Women, Body Mist & Hair Mist
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sweet Gourmands.Key Notes:Black Cherry, Almond Cream, Bourbon Vanilla.Fragrance Description:Addictive, risque, and sinful, this vanilla-scented body mist could become your biggest vice. Notes of black cherry, hazelnut, almond cream, and bourbon vanilla create a blend thatu2019s intoxicating and divine..About the Bottle:The glass bottle has an ombre effect reflecting the black-cherry and creamy-vanilla notes of the juice within..About the Fragrance:I am interested in the modern American approach to fragrance, and gourmands are so uniquely that. VANILLA SIN is a chic Brooklyn girl, out on the town, that's both playful yet mysterious. u2014Bee Shapiro, Ellis Brooklyn founder.Clean
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Water (Aqua/Eau), Fragrance (Parfum), Citric Acid, Tetrahydroxypropyl Ethylenediamine, Alpha-Terpinene, Anethole, Benzaldehyde, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Cinnamate, Benzyl Salicylate, Beta-Caryophyllene, Camphor, Cananga Odorata Oil/Extract, Carvone, Cinnamal, Cinnamomum Zeylanicum Bark Oil, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Citral, Citrus Aurantium Flower Oil, Citrus Aurantium Peel Oil, Coumarin, Eugenia Caryophyllus Oil, Eugenol, Eugenyl Acetate, Farnesol, Geraniol, Geranyl Acetate, Hexadecanolactone, Isoeugenol, Juniperus Virginiana Oil, Limonene, Linalool, Linalyl Acetate, Myroxylon Pereirae Oil/Extract, Pinene, Pogostemon Cablin Oil, Rose Ketones, Terpineol, Terpinolene, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Vanillin...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Ellis Brooklyn body mists are designed to be used liberally. .-Spray anywhere and everywhere, including your body, hair, clothes, and home.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love vanilla. I love Gourmand but this fragrance was so faint, I could barely smell it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product for Christmas and I absolutely love it! I normally wouldnu2019t go for this type of fragrance but it smells so amazing! Itu2019s musky but not too much and also has a hint of vanilla. I will Defintely be repurchasing!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance, receive a lot of compliments.  For a body mists it has longevity. Would love if they made an EDP.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like it. Smells more musky and woodsy when u first spray it, but after a while it's more vanillay. Lasts a good while.ud83dudc4d
A really nice hair and fragrance body mist. Love the unique vanilla notes in this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: after several uses trying to get used to it, looking yo see if I adjust to different notes over time, I just get a sharp floral scent above vanilla and cherry. It's a nice perfume in general I suppose but not really what's advertised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Immediately in love with this. Itu2019s creamy, cozy, sweet, nutty, warm. It reminds of a baked cherry almond tart. What I love about this is that the cherry isnu2019t a standout in this, but rather plays as a companion to the other notes. It makes this so well rounded.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Delicious smelling!! This smells so good, and it actually lasts a good while on the skin which is hard to find with gourmand fragrances. Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: way too much white flower scent . best part is the cute bottle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has nice notes of Vanilla Bourbon, Roasted Almonds, Hazelnut and Cherry black infused with Amaretto that strike a perfect balance between bitter and sweet, it has a beautiful cherry and vanilla inspired gradient colour

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: They have NAILED this scent!!! I already regret not buying the bigger size. So good and unique.  Definitely recommend giving it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great! Vanilla is not too sweet ! Lasts on clothing and hair but not very long on skin. Lots of compliments - worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the vanilla scent of this body mist.  It's not too sweet, a bit more sophisticated and it layers really well with some of my favorite fragrances.  It is so so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a weird sweet flying smell. Triggers headaches. Itu2019s not vanilla, more like burnt cherry with too much of a cloying sweet smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to get this one based on the notes described... It's not BAD... but I'm pretty sure I'll return it. The initial spray is intoxicating, however, it dries down very powdery and like synthetic sweet... that's the best I can describe it.  If that's your vibe, you'll love it. But if you like more gourmond (Me!) scents, this is not it. I'll stick to my Milk+ from Commodity when I'm craving my gourmond scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: sprayed it on my skin, purchased it (I got influenced by the store associate,who said ), but returned it right away before I even left the mall & exchanged it with PHLUR Vanilla Skin right away. This scent just didn't do it for me, it smelled synthetic not vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very very light if any scent.  No cherry smelt.  When returning they kept the $10 Sephora value I used to purchase & wouldnu2019t let me trade value for something else.  Total rip off

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to buy 100 bottles of this right now. Blind purchase, and it is divine! A warm vanilla, almond, hint of grown-up spice, tart cherry whipped cream scent that has me in a chokehold. I so hope they make it into perfume. It performs well for a perfumed body spray and it is perfection for layering. Safe blind buy for all vanilla and gourmand lovers!

reviews.review_title: I smelled a girl & didnu2019t like itu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like cherry chapstick ud83dudc4eud83cudffc would not recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not what i was expecting, but in a pleasant way. its vanilla but with a spicy vibe, like cinnamon or something like that. I do have to say the cherry is in the background and quite faint, however i think this scent is perfect for fall, it has a holiday vibe to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this fragrance but found it disappointing. When sprayed in the air or on clothing, the cherry, almond cream, and vanilla notes are nonexistent. On my skin, thereu2019s a slight cherry scent, but itu2019s more medicinal, like cough syrup, rather than sweet or tart. The almond note feels synthetic and lacks warmth, reminding me of Jergens lotion rather than something cozy or inviting. The incense and peru balsam notes really ruin this fragrance. Overall, the scent is quite powdery and dense, similar to older perfumes that have a strong powder and alcohol smell. Itu2019s also very potent, and I think layering it with other products would only intensify the heaviness. While the packaging is beautiful, the fragrance itself didnu2019t live up to my expectations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This smells AMAZING!!! I love it. I blind bought before I smelled in store and today I smelled it. IT'S SO GOOD!!! I want another bottle before I even get mine in the mail ud83dude0dud83dude0dud83dude0d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: the scent is very strong. Hits of cherry, spice and vanilla. More of a fall/winter scent. Warm and comforting. Not for you if you like light, floral or fruity scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous scent! It smells like vanilla with a hint of spicy so itu2019s not too overbearing. I generally lean towards more masculine scent but this is perfect for when I want a more feminine balance. Gifted by ellisbrooklyn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Ellis Brooklyn. This smells really good. Like a spicy vanilla. It seems a little strong at first but it settles into a nice and subtle vanilla. It lasts longer than most other body sprays I've tried and the packaging is beautiful! Definitely worth a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Ellisbrooklyn. The vanilla sin hair and body mist is a really nice fragrance. I love that it is a very light scent and d not to warm or heavy. It is perfect for the fall and winter seasons and it lasts on my hair and body all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're a vanilla scent lover then this is for you. The black cherry, sweet vanilla (but not too sweet) combo is divine and engulfs you in this warm almond/vanilla aroma without being overpowering. I also love that its a hair mist too. I wasn't expecting it to last as long as it did but it's pretty long lasting for a body mist. Complimentary from Ellis Brooklyn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It smells a lot like Carmex lip balm, but a very sweet yummy version. Initially, I thought about returning it, but it's kind of growing on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells so unique it is the perfect balance between a strong sweet scent it smells soft yet strong and its the perfect day or night perfume i also love spraying it in my hair and scent stays for a long time.  Gifted by ellis brooklyn

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by EllisBrooklyn - YOUR NEW GO-TO SCENT! Seriously this is soooo good. Considering itu2019s a body and hair mist, the scent actually lasts for quite a while! I really like it and have received many compliments! Definitely needed in your fragrance collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't understand the good reviews.  I can't smell cherry or vanilla. It smells like strong cinnamon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This body mist offered by ellisbrooklyn is so nice to use. Itu2019s pretty strong smelling and lasts long compared to other body mists. Itu2019s a very pleasant vanilla smell and great for vanilla lovers! The bottle is a cute color too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Ellis Brooklyn. This fragrance mist (Vanilla Sin) from Ellis Brooklyn is a vanilla lovers dream. It has notes of black cherry along with bourbon vanilla balancing it so well. I find the smell to be very intoxicating and seductive. The bottle is luxurious too. The warm and spicy scent is perfect for the upcoming fall weather.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is seriously the best scent ever! I hope they make it into a perfume! You can truly smell the combination of Vanilla and cherry..it's intoxicating!

reviews.review_title: Lasting and the scent is Amazing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff smells delicious and lasts a long time...I have alot of body spray sol de Janeiro ect...this one in #1

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I get so many compliments from this fragrance itu2019s kinda insane!! I would describe it to be pretty sweet but still mature and the scent lasts pretty much all day. Itu2019s on the warm side so itu2019s my go to for colder months!

reviews.review_title: Don't be fooled by the name!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I own all of the other fragrance mists & love them! So, I was expecting to be obsessed with this one too. Black cherry, hazelnut, vanilla infusion are the main notes that lured me in! I was expecting a sexy delicious smelling gourmand fragrance. But this in my opinion is awful! Smells like Carmex lip balm. Horrible smelling and had to scrub it off. I think it's the incense and peru balsam notes that make it smell awful. Those notes just don't blend at all with all the other delicious notes in it. I figured the other top-notch notes would make this scent smell fabulous. Was very disappointed with it and now will be returning it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This body fragrance is so addicting, I have to force myself to put it somewhere I donu2019t look at it all the time to make sure Iu2019m not constantly spraying myself. Iu2019m a vanilla addict and this tickles every part of my addiction. So even though Iu2019m being gifted by ellisbrooklynI have since gone and bought my own! The long lasting vanilla smell is enveloped in this sense of warmth and maturity. The cherries add this beautiful fragrance boost in the first moments of wearing before it settles into this seduction of vanilla and spice. Itu2019s one for the handbag thatu2019s for sure and has garnered me many compliments!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I blindly purchased this thinking this was going to smell delicious.This stinks!Smells like play dough mixed with something spicy.If youu2019re expecting cherries or vanilla think twice.

The initial spray was so gorgeous, I got a lot of cherry and a bit of vanilla. But the initial drydown is just very vanilla on me with the tiniest whiff of cherry. Very sweet scent overall. I really like it, I just wish I could smell more of the cherry note!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first I didn't like it. There's no black cherry to me and I got this one especially because I adore black cherry scent so I was disappointed. I can't smell any cherry in this fragrance ud83eudd37ud83cudffcu200du2640ufe0f It grew on me today and I decided I will not return it. It's more of a strong vanilla mixed with almond and maybe amaretto...I never smelled something like this before it's quite unique. I like it but it's not what I was hoping to be. If you're looking for a cherry body mist you will be disappointed ud83dude1e

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The VANILLA SIN Hair & Body Fragrance Mist has a nice vanilla scent, but unfortunately, itu2019s a bit too overpowering for me. The fragrance is strong and tends to linger longer than I would prefer. While it might be perfect for someone who enjoys bold, sweet scents, I found it a little too much for everyday use. gifted by ellisbrooklyn

love this scent!! the vanilla is perfectly complimented but the cherry and almond cream!! itu2019s not overpowering and not too sweet either. i love spraying this in my hair too! it lasts all day and i get so many compliments whenever i wear it!! gifted by ellisbrooklyn

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by ellisbrooklyn. When I spelled this, I thought this was THE vanilla scent you think of when you dream of vanilla scents. I like that itu2019s a body and hair mist, which means it wonu2019t damage your hair like a typical perfume. It has a nice scent that can be layered to be more sweet or spicy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Ellis Brooklyn. I really like this. It has a sort of traditional vanilla meets Tom ford elegance to it, you get a hit of vanilla at the top but then the dry down is more sultry. Really beautiful scent and I love the bottle as well, super sturdy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Vanilla Sin Hair & Body mist is a must have in my routine! The fresh vanilla scents and light aroma lasts all day, leaving a positive impression in any room I walk into! P.S and you know it is good when mom approves. Get it now! Offered by ellisbrooklyn

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m surprised! Smells as a perfume. I love the vanilla scent, because it gives me a youthful, delicate, sophisticated and female aroma. It can last a few hours, especially if you reapply it. I really liked this spray, it's better than many I've tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m going to be honest! I hardly like vanilla fragrances but this one is very different, this hair and body mist is so perfect for this fall season. It does last all day on me, I really recommend it if you like sweet fragrances. Offered by ellisbrooklyn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Ellis Brooklyn to give my honest review. I absolutely love this fragrance. It smells so freaking expensive and I love that itu2019s a glass component. The fragrance last for hours. Definitely worth trying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I always keep a fragrance spray in my bag for when Iu2019m on the go. I was out and about and just got this new body mist, so I sprayed it on my way out from picking up groceries so I could just have a fresh smell feeling-I wasnu2019t thinking about it, and oh my gosh. This smells so good!! itu2019s not overpowering either, itu2019s truly the perfect amount of scent. It has a delicious seroma that has a sweetness to it. I will never take this out of my bag. This is definitely my go to anytime. I need a little pick me up and the perfect way to start the day! Gifted by ellisbrooklyn

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have found my new Fall fragrance!!  This vanilla sin scent smells so seductive and is such a spicy warm vanilla.  I think this is perfect for the cooler months.  Even though itu2019s a fragrance mist, it lasts throughout the day on my skin. 10/10 recommend!  This fragrance was gifted by ellisbrooklyn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: #giftedbyellisbrooklyn I have never smelled such a sweet and delicious body mist before. It's like a delicious vanilla cake with a hint of cream. It says it's for hair and body (but the description doesn't say anything about hair...) If you like sweet smells, this is perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this body spray but it is honestly more amazing than I was even expecting it to be! The Vanilla Sin Hair and Body Fragrance Mist from Ellis Brooklyn is the best-smelling body spray I've ever used! It has such deep notes of vanilla and I couldn't believe how long it stays. I love the bottle and it's great to keep in your purse or vanity. I've had tons of compliments on this spray. I wear this spray daily and plan to repurchase it once this bottle is gone. Gifted by ellisbrooklyn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Ellisbrooklyn. This Vanilla Mist is a lovely, light fragrance for both body and hair. It leaves a subtle, sweet vanilla scent that lasts all day without being overpowering. Perfect for a quick refresh throughout the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to get my hands on this hair and body mist and now I am absolutely obsessed! I usually like super sweet smelling sense but this one is the perfect sultry sent for every day use! It does have depth to it, which I love! Gifted by ellisbrooklyn

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Vanilla Sin by Ellis Brooklyn comes in the most beautiful glass ,painted bottle. I also think Vanilla Sin is the perfect name. Initially, I was greeted by a delightful blend of cherry and incense, with a slight hint of vanilla. As the mist dries down, it shifts into a more mature, slightly sweeter vanilla. The staying power is impressive, lasting over 8 hours on my skin and even longer on my clothes. This is definitely a sophisticated vanilla mist. So if you aren't sure about this Vanilla Sin by Ellis Brooklyn body mist, this is your sign to grab it now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Here is why I LOVE my new Vanilla Sin Body Mist gifted by Ellis Brooklyn. I currently am using the 50 ml size bottle thatu2019s made of good quality since itu2019s not easy to break. The smell is out of this world. It mostly smells like vanilla with a masculine touch to it which lasts a really long time. The smell lingers for a long time; especially where I sprayed it. This is definitely perfect for evening wear and the upcoming colder temperatures we are about to face in NYC. The best way I can describe this smell is sexy. With the black cherry giving it more weight to the smell and the vanilla giving it some softness and elegance to it. The spray comes out very light and its mist covers a lot of area wherever you apple it. This is a fantastic gift for yourself and itu2019s easy to carry in your purse or store in your locker or office whenever you want to re-apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ellis Brooklyn's Vanilla Sin body mist is a new favorite of mine. It has a rich, luxurious vanilla scent that stands out because it doesnu2019t have that artificial or overly sweet vibe that many vanilla fragrances tend to have. Instead, it's warm, slightly spicy, and feels sophisticated. The scent lingers beautifully without being overpowering, making it perfect for everyday use or layering with other fragrances. I love how it brings a sense of comfort and elegance, making it a staple in my collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Ellisbrooklyn in exchange for my honest review. This body mist is so nice. I love a good fragrance that has a sweet scent to it and this one takes the cake. It last for a very long time surprisingly. Iu2019m also surprised you donu2019t need a lot of it because it is very potent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Ellis Brooklyn. This is such a unique vanilla! As it dries down, I am able to smell more of the cherry. Itu2019s a beautiful cherry vanilla scent and not an artificial cherry. After several hours of wear I was still able to smell it on my arm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect body mist spray for the fall time. Vanilla is becoming such a trendy sent and I am obsessed. It lasts forever and I get complemented on it so many times throughout my day. Has a subtle hint of cherries too. Offered by ellisbrooklyn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this hair and body fragrance mist- Vanilla Sin. I used it on my hair and it stayed a day long. I like the vanilla and hazelnut notes. I smelled like Autumn/fall. This product is Offered by Ellis Brooklyn.

reviews.review_title: Love that it's a clean product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This body mist smells AMAZING. If you like warm vanilla scents, this is for you. I think it's perfect for fall. It's not too sweet and just smells yummy, but also natural. It lasts a decently long time too. This was gifted by ellisbrooklyn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Im obsessed with this smell! It lasts forever on my skin too! Such a good vanilla scent with a light hint of cherry! One of my new fave scents! The bottle is also so nice! I love that this is a perfume and hair mist as well! Big fan!   Gifted by ellisbrooklyn

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very beautiful and stylish bottle. As you open it, you can immediately feel the delicate and pleasant aroma of vanilla with a combination of cherry. This aroma is ideal for me, as I like sweet and delicate aromas. I apply the mist in the neck and decollete area. The aroma is long-lasting and I feel it throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Vanilla Sin hair and body mist from Ellis Brooklyn is a very interesting one. Itu2019s definitely on a heavier side. I wouldnu2019t say that it smells much of a vanilla. To me itu2019s an overall sweet, evening scent. Itu2019s long lasting for sure. I love the bottle too - itu2019s glass so itu2019s easier to recycle. Price point is also ok. Gifted by Ellis Brooklyn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Vanilla Sin Hair & Fragrance Body Mist is an absolute delight! The combination of black cherry, hazelnut, and vanilla creates a warm, rich scent that feels both sweet and sophisticated. It lingers beautifully in my hair and on my skin without being overpowering. Perfect for everyday wear or special occasions when you want to feel extra luxurious! Highly recommend if you're a fan of sweet, indulgent scents. Gifted by ellisbrooklyn

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely addictive! I'm not usually a 'vanilla girl' but this sold me. I'm obsessed with the black cherry note in this scent! SO good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This body fragrance has an enticingly gourmand scent. It's a sweet, sensual aroma that makes you crave more. The fragrance lingers for hours and is noticeable even as you walk by. Wearing it makes you feel irresistibly sexy. The packaging exudes a captivating, sensual night vibe. This was gifted by ellisbrooklyn.
